ModMetaData.name: BondageBedTorture Furniture Addon 1.4
ModMetaData.author: Mr. Mauer
ModMetaData.description:
This mod is a tribute to the BondageBed Torture mod by some asian guy 金兔子拉面 and Shaddowrabbit.
Furniture included: - Prisoner Pole - Prisoner Cage facing left and right due how the mod works. - Pillory - Torture Cross - True Cross - Bondage Operating Table - Beheading Block
Recommended to use:
XND Targeting Modes Allows you to aim for Head/Body/Arms/Legs. This will help you for proper beheading! Medical IV's Will help you on that bondage operating table for sure!
I recommend the whip tool ranged weapon from Vanilla Weapons Extended by OskarPotocki! Also the furniture sprites are inspired by the "Vanilla" franchise style!
Enjoy my second mod!
